sentences: Kõige parem koht, kust leiate need asjad, on Internet.
Ma tean, et teil on võimalus leiate need asjad mujalt.
context: The word 'leiate' is the second person plural form of the verb 'leidma', which means to find or locate something in Estonian. It is commonly used in sentences where the subject is a group of people trying to discover or identify an object, location, or information.
